input.sentences: got to the west coast this week in preparation for my big event .
we are getting some last minute training in . love the fresh air .
great photo ops too . hills may be tough for riding but can 's argue with the view .
also the serine coast line was amazing .

output.sentences: I spent all week preparing to head west.
I spent every minute I could training.
The riding was tough but it was worth it to see the view.
I loved to look at the serine coastline.
When I got there, I had to spend a recovery day drinking beer.
